name: The Legend of Sigurd
description:
This is the first build of the game for public testing. There are still some bugs with the equipment. If your stats look wrong, try going to another area, they should update to the correct stats. Also, I still have to work out how to save equipped items and inventory.

You can use a controller to move Sigurd and activate the menu, but otherwise all the controls are based on the keyboard and mouse inputs.

To move use either the arrow keys or w a s and d. Enter activates the menu in the overworld, escape closes the menu.
